Name: Big Shots
Review Text: My favourite spot in Amsterdam. The food is unbelievable with a big variety of food, alongside an amazing atmosphere. I first visited 6 months ago and now am a frequent regular when I visit the country. Perfect for smokers and drinkers ‚Ä¶

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Nice ambiance inside. plenty of screens to watch sports and able to smoke inside without tabccoüôè just out the center so quieter than those bars on the inside. Plenty of spirits behind the bar too and have a good few tables inside to drink ‚Ä¶

Review Text: It's not the type of place you go on purpose (at least I hope not, you're in Amsterdam go try something out of your comfort zone!) But if you're super drunk and in an emergency hungry situation, then eh why not, it tasted fine enough I think

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Brilliant place, nice food really relaxed. Visited a couple of times. Able to smoke own cannabis.

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Love it. A nice chat and catch up on the football. Warm friendly bar keeper, good drinks.

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Super tasty dinner there with the mixed grill plate! Spaghetti also looked amazing, if hungry and around this location, do grab a bite!

Name: Big Shots

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Legend of a place!!! Was able to request the change the football over. 4 TVs and was able to have my own TV for Leeds game while other game was on rest. Nice beer and staff very helpful.

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: 5 Canadians travelling together, 3 in Amsterdam for the fist time!  Your cozy caf√© quickly became our favourite go-to!  Staff are the frikkin' most amazingly welcoming and friendly people you would hope to encounter.   Want to sit outside, feeling a little chilly?  Warm blankets and hot drinks, could not ask for more :)

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Typical decent bar sports bar with great selection of beers and   food. You do however have to pay a tax on each total of alcohol you buy, so buy in bulk. For example, 2 separate rounds of drinks will incur the 8% alcohol tax. Also, there are 2 bars with the same name! Impossible when trying to find half cut üòâ

Name: Big Shots
Review Text: Warm, comfortable, friendly and no pressure. A versatile place to eat, drink and relax. Popular even on a Sunday night. Great place to go as a solo traveller.
